title: LeaverBuster Changes
body: I usually play bot games because I know I may or may not have much time left, and if there is a problem with my connection/I have to leave, that my absence will not adversely affect my teammates. I ask why does LeaverBuster put me in a lower matchmaking queue because I left a bot game?

replies.body:
The base line matter is, YOU ARE NOT ALLOWED TO LEAVE A MATCH.

That's it. That's all there is.
Leave and you deserve to be punished.

If you don't want to play under LoL's rulebook, then don't play LoL, simple as that. Just don't. Go play another game.

You are not 100% correct there because even if you leave a match and then re-connect a few minutes later you still get a warning, so what that means is that everyone who occasionally has internet trouble or computer failure or leaves for emergencies or lives in a stormy area or is a troll or afker 
shouldnt play this game, that gets rid of like 80% of the community which isn't the best money making scheme to be honest, no one is gunna buy skins if they think their account is gunna be banned, which means less money for all powerful riot which in turn means less cool skins for us, less featured game modes, less extra stuff like promo and teaser videos or cinematics or anything like that. personally i don't mind if someone occasionally afk's if i can have all that stuff.
I've had several total failure shutdowns since the new Leaver Buster was implemented, and I've not been hit with the Leaver Buster.

Really? lucky i have had only one which was technically the servers fault anyway and i got all this warning stuff, I'm almost too scared to play a game cos i don't want my account banned cos i have spent so much on it. :(
I'm usually back into the game within fourish minutes.

i am making a complaint this leaver buster bullshit needs to be removed from my account i have made probably three accounts because ur shitty servers keep lagging ut so i end up getting 20 min leaverbuster after i wated out my 5 min one the the tim min 1 then i gotta do a 20 minute 0one this is about an hor and 20 mins out of my time waiting for this sht because of your bullshit servers that lag me out i will carry my team lag out with probably a minute left and then i get leaverbuster and i made my team win and got honours this is a load of crap if you wanna punish us do this but just ban us for an hour and 20 mins we gotta wait out it is the same thing but a better way of punishing summoners sp they dont lave the game like i am now going please take this complaint into consideration because i dont think i will play league again because of this bullshit

Play a custom against bots if you know you have no time left, the game doesn't ban you for that. Why go into a mode where the other 4 people are expecting a 5th teammate when you know you may have to leave mid-game. Honestly...
because you still left a game and potentially ruined it for 4 other people.
